DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective study meniscal tear repair least one-year post repair status . All patient treat Ceterix NovoStitch device . The primary objective study assess clinical repair success rate via reoperation PROs great 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Predictors Early Success From Circumferential Compression STITCH Meniscal Repairs
DOC.detailed_description: The study retrospective , non-randomized , single-group assignment , open-label study repair meniscal tear status post repair . The following clinical efficacy endpoint evaluate great 12 month : - Reoperation rate - Validated patient-reported outcome measure - Contribution follow retrospective covariates failure outcomes available : Type tear , Location tear ( lateral versus medial ) , Chronicity symptom , Nature tear ( degenerative versus traumatic ) , Length tear , Patient age , Patient gender , Length rehabilitation protocol , Performance trephination , Inclusion biologic enhancement , Meniscal repair alone versus meniscal repair combine ACL reconstruction .
